title: Experience Kabalen
subtitle: Authentic Filipino Cuisine
content: Indulge in home-style Filipino cooking, Kamayan feasts, and regional specialties prepared daily.

title: Book a Table
content: Reserve your Kamayan feast or family dinner with our online reservation form.

title: Chef Specials
content: Seasonal dishes sourced from local markets, featuring grilled seafood and sizzling platters.

title: Classic Favorites
content: Enjoy adobo, kare-kare, sisig, and more timeless Filipino favorites, made from scratch daily.

title: Today’s Feature
content: Ask about our rotating turo-turo trays packed with freshly prepared viands and desserts.

title: Kamayan Feast Highlights
content: Feast with friends and family — no utensils required for this communal dining experience.

title: Our Story
content: Kabalen brings Pampanga’s culinary heritage to Bathurst & Wilson, celebrating Filipino hospitality.

title: Visit Us
content: We’re open daily with extended weekend hours for Kamayan dinners and private celebrations.
